summary: You can now ride a rowboat on the water.
descriptionHtml:
You can now buy a rowboat in the Windhelmfor 500 gold and hop on it and travel on water. The boat cannot break and moving is the same controls as walking. To exit the boat simply jump, run, or sail and touch the shore. It can only be used in the Sea Of Ghosts and the waters that connect to the Sea Of Ghosts. The boat will not port in the city unlike a horse that will be stables outside the city. If you are using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5739/?]World Map - Skyrim Hold Borders [/url]we do have a patch with the mod that will add the road that leads from Winterhold to the Winterhold Docks roads on the world map. You can download that optional if you wish. If you want the Skyrim 2011 version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1019/?]here[/url]. Also check out my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76279/?]Dragonborn Rowboat[/url] mod. And if you play Oblivion also look atmy [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/44081?]Oblivion Rowboats[/url].

There is a patch that requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5739/?]World Map - Skyrim Hold Borders [/url]and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74941?]Hearthfire Roads[/url] that will fix the roads on the world map so they all appear. You can download it [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76242?]here[/url].

Requirements
Skyrim
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5739/?]World Map - Skyrim Hold Borders [/url](Optional)

To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin, and bsa into your data folder.
author: LegoManIAm94

files.name: World Map - Skyrim Hold Borders Patch
